title: What is HDR ? (with a grain of salt)

media:group.media:title: What is HDR ? (with a grain of salt)
media:group.media:description:
High Dynamic Range explained.

Music: https://posy.bandcamp.com/
Or Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/3zkrmBzisZKngkrd6gXLHg
Or Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/us/artist/posy/1522538629

Used HDR TV: Panasonic TX-55GZW954 (2019 model). It has an OLED screen from LG but much better processing, resulting in almost no banding and no crushed blacks. OLED does not need the local dimming of LCD.
